overview.description: During the Development Phase, the system is constructed according to detailed design specifications, including coding, configuration, integration, and testing.

subsections.title: Objectives
content: Develop and integrate system components according to approved design.
Ensure compliance with enterprise standards and performance baselines.

content.responsibility: Validates that the developed system satisfies business requirements.
Oversees development activities and ensures deliverables are completed.
Executes development tasks, code reviews, and documentation updates.

responsibility: Enterprise Architecture ensures compliance with standards.
Security confirms implementation of security requirements.
Acquisition validates product and service procurement.
Budget & Finance monitor and verify expenditures.

subsections.title: Activities
content: Develop and configure software, hardware, and databases.
Perform coding, integration, and peer reviews.
Conduct unit, module, and integration testing.
Update Test Plan and perform data migration preparation.
Develop O&M Manual, Security Plan, Risk Assessment, and Training Plan.
Document configuration management and change control.

subsections.title: Deliverables
content: Final Test Plan and fully developed Business Product.
O&M Manual, System Security Plan, and Risk Assessment Report.

content.objective: Verify the system is complete, integrated, and ready for formal testing.
phase_specific: Business Product fully developed and unit tested.
All deliverables complete and integration verified.
generic: Stage Gate Review completed with approval to proceed.

subsections.title: Project Review
content: Ensure components are developed per approved design.
Confirm readiness for formal testing and documentation completeness.

content.title: Development Stage Gate Review
focus: Completion of development and integration activities.
Verification of requirement compliance and testing success.
Approval of deliverables and transition readiness.
